div.div:
bump: release version 0.5.0
This release introduces significant improvements including:
### Major Features - Wiremock integration testing framework for comprehensive mock testing - Copy/move-to-video-folder functionality for match command - ConfigService architecture replacing legacy config system - Success/failure indicators for file operations
### AI Model Updates - Default AI model upgraded to gpt-4.1-mini for better performance
### Bug Fixes - Critical copy mode logic error preserving source files - Cache reuse mechanism supporting copy/move parameters - Test isolation improvements with proper mutex handling
### Developer Experience - Complete English documentation conversion - Enhanced testing framework with 77.71% code coverage - All quality checks passing (compilation, formatting, clippy, docs)
This represents a major milestone with comprehensive testing infrastructure and improved user experience while maintaining backward compatibility.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

fix(config): correct help hint and add TODO for config set
- Add a TODO reminder to implement setting configuration values through the ConfigService in the ConfigAction::Set branch. - Update the configuration error hint to reference the correct CLI command by changing `subx config --help` to `subx-cli config --help`.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>
Created new tag v0.5.0 in jim60105/subx-cli

fix(config): correct help hint and add TODO for config set
- Add a TODO reminder to implement setting configuration values through the ConfigService in the ConfigAction::Set branch. - Update the configuration error hint to reference the correct CLI command by changing `subx config --help` to `subx-cli config --help`.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

docs: refine project description and standardize docs
- Refine the project description in Cargo.toml and both README files to “AI subtitle processing CLI tool, which automatically matches, renames, and converts subtitle files.” - Remove the “early development” Note section from English and Chinese READMEs. - Standardize feature list entries and icons for File Organization, Format Conversion, Batch/Bulk Processing, and Cache Management in both READMEs. - Update the heading for installation Method 3 in the Chinese README to “使用 Cargo 安裝” for consistency.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

chore: upgrade default AI model to gpt-4.1-mini
- Bump the default AI model to “gpt-4.1-mini” in README, config examples, and the `Default` implementation. - Update all test cases, mocks, CLI/config commands, and code examples to use “gpt-4.1” or “gpt-4.1-mini” instead of “gpt-4” or “gpt-4o-mini.” - Refresh the hardcoded `ai_model_used` field in cache metadata to reflect the new “gpt-4.1-mini” model.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

docs: translate Cargo.toml comments to English
- Translate package description from Chinese to English - Convert all dependency section comments from Chinese to English - Improve code maintainability for international contributors - Maintain consistent English documentation across the project
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

chore: increase docs check timeout to prevent CI failures
- Increase the timeout for running scripts/check_docs.sh from 20 to 30 seconds in both Copilot instructions and AGENTS documentation.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

docs: convert comments to English and document paths
- Convert all Chinese inline and documentation comments to English across TestConfigBuilder, CacheData, and matcher engine tests for clarity. - Add missing doc comments describing source and target PathBuf fields in CopyToVideoFolder and MoveToVideoFolder operations.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

test: convert tests to English
- Convert all test comments and docstrings from Chinese to English for consistency - Replace Chinese literals in tests (e.g. “預覽模式”, “檔案”, “編碼”, “信心值”) with English equivalents (“preview mode”, “File”, “Encoding”, “Confidence”) - Translate and standardize comments in common test utilities (file managers, mock generators, integration macros, validators) to English - Update TODOs, debug messages, and assertion descriptions to English without changing test logic - Ensure all new English messages and patterns align across CLI, audio, config, encoding, match, parallel, sync, and wiremock tests
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

test(config): add ConfigService integration tests and finalize migration
- Add integration tests for get_config_value in tests/config_value_integration_tests.rs - Add integration tests for file I/O and reset_to_defaults in tests/config_service_file_integration_tests.rs - Refactor ProductionConfigService::get_config_file_path to use EnvironmentProvider for SUBX_CONFIG_PATH injection - Add phase 4-5 job report file
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

refactor(config): update config_command to use ConfigService
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

feat: replace legacy config with unified ConfigService
- Add a new codex job report detailing the complete removal of the legacy config system and migration to the new ConfigService. - Expand the backlog plan with a clear five-milestone roadmap for migrating from `config_legacy.rs` to dependency-injected ConfigService. - Delete the entire `config_legacy.rs` module and inline all configuration type definitions (Config, AIConfig, FormatsConfig, SyncConfig, GeneralConfig, ParallelConfig, OverflowStrategy) in `src/config/mod.rs` with updated documentation. - Enhance the ConfigService trait by adding methods for save_config, save_config_to_file, get_config_file_path, get_config_value, and reset_to_defaults, and implement these in both ProductionConfigService and TestConfigService. - Refactor the config_command logic to remove manual Config struct manipulation—Set now returns an unsupported-operation error, while Get, List, and Reset use ConfigService methods. - Update validator logic in `validator.rs` to use `as_deref` instead of unwrapping Option for safer API key checks.
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>

docs: add comprehensive config legacy migration completion plan
- Create detailed migration plan for complete removal of config_legacy.rs - Define 7-phase migration strategy with ConfigService integration - Include comprehensive code examples with Rustdoc-compliant documentation - Specify acceptance criteria and quality validation steps - Estimate 4-day timeline with risk mitigation strategies - Plan unified config type definitions in mod.rs structure - Design enhanced ConfigService trait with all legacy functionality

docs(testing): add Wiremock integration testing framework section
- describe MockOpenAITestHelper, MatchResponseGenerator and macros - update test directory structure
Signed-off-by: CHEN, CHUN <jim60105@gmail.com>
